This repository contains the complete submission for the Cultus Real-World Project:
"Interpretable Machine Learning: SHAP and LIME for Complex Financial Modeling".

All code is fully implemented in:
CJR_Financial_SHAP_LIME_Krishna1.ipynb

The repository includes:
- Preprocessed dataset
- Trained models
- SHAP global summary
- SHAP local explanations (10 instances)
- LIME local explanations (10 matching instances)
- Code for training XGBoost and Neural Network models
- Comparative analysis text in README.md

That's it.
This file prevents GitIngest from collecting unwanted garbage.
